description: Dive into "Enchanting Escapes: Romance in Bophut" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Enchanting Escapes: Romance in Bophut

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the vibrant Bo Put district of Koh Samui, the Big Buddha Temple (Wat Phra Yai) is home to a stunning gilded statue that dates back to 1972. This iconic landmark not only draws visitors for its spiritual significance but also for its picturesque surroundings. The nearby beach offers a delightful mix of low- to mid-cost bungalows, many featuring excellent dining options and luxurious spas.

sources.snippet: Known as the Big Buddha Temple, this Buddhist temple depicts a modern golden Buddha sitting in a Mara posture (symbolic of purity and enlightenment). Sitting tall at a rocky island and looking over the island‚Äôs splendour, this landmark unravels its beauty from a far.
sources.shortName: Rekindle Romance In Koh Samui, A Place Brimming With Love & Luxury
Koh Samui - A complete guide to the romantic tropical paradise

places.name: Wat Phra Yai

reviews.text: such a beautiful place, with great views. it is free to enter, but suggested to leave a small offering. there are cafes, shops & restaurants all around the entrance. there is a monk at the bottom of the temple, who will bless you with holy water for good luck, if you are interested as well. make sure to dress modestly, as it is a temple.

This place is awesome and you can get a beautiful sunset view at the right time. Lots of planes flying overhead too which got us some pretty cool shots.

Full of cats and dogs on the bottom section (they don't go upstairs from what we saw)

This temple is one of the island's most iconic landmarks, featuring a massive golden Buddha statue that you can admire from afar and up close. It's a peaceful place that offers stunning views, especially if you visit in the morning or late afternoon when the sun isn't too harsh.

Things to Keep in Mind:
‚Ä¢	Dress Code: Since this is a temple, be sure to dress modestly-no shorts, bikinis, or revealing outfits. If you forget, some shops nearby may sell sarongs or cover-ups.
‚Ä¢	Donations: There aren't many ritual stations or activities like in some other temples, but donation boxes are available if you'd like to contribute.
‚Ä¢	Parking & Facilities: There's some parking available inside the temple, but the restrooms are not in the best condition. Some stalls don't have locks, and some may not have running water-so it's best to use a restroom elsewhere if possible.

The temple grounds also have small shops selling clothing and souvenirs, which makes for a nice stroll. If you love cats, you'll be happy to find many stray cats around the temple. It seems that kind locals take care of them, but if you're feeling generous, bringing some cat food (dry kibble) would be a nice gesture. You'll find most of the cats near the restrooms, the front shop area, and even on the temple rooftops!

Overall, Big Buddha Temple is a simple yet significant landmark on Koh Samui. It's not packed with activities, but the beauty of the Buddha statue, the spiritual atmosphere, and the adorable temple cats make it a special place to visit.

places.address: Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled on the northeastern coast of Koh Samui, Wat Plai Laem is a mesmerizing temple complex that captivates visitors with its vibrant colors and serene atmosphere. The highlight here is the stunning 18-armed statue of Guanyin, the goddess of mercy and compassion, which gracefully rises above a tranquil lake. This remarkable site beautifully showcases the blend of Thai culture with Chinese heritage, making it an essential stop for anyone exploring the island.

sources.snippet: It is just 15 mins drive from the airport and is at close distance from the Wat Plai Laem and Big Buddha Statue.
sources.shortName: Koh Samui - A complete guide to the romantic tropical paradise

places.name: Wat Plai Laem

reviews.text: I do not know if it would be everyone's experience, but for my wife and myself it was a great place to find cats taking their naps which was fun to see as they were relaxing admist this grand temple. The statues and general grounds were among the best we saw in our trip to Thailand.

Lovely quick visit.  Not a large temple but interesting to see.  More of a modern twist in ancient temples. Ie felt a but like being in a theme park rather than places like Bangkok. But worth a visit as not much in Koh Samui. We got a taxi to the big Buddha close by, then a tuk tuk from here to fisherman's village before a taxi home late in the evening.  Fantastic day out.

Free to enter, bought some fish food, the fish and turtles were huge!

Wat Plai Laem is a simple and somewhat dated temple complex featuring two large, eye-catching statues of Buddhist and Chinese deities. While the statues are impressive in size, they don't offer much beyond a quick photo opportunity.

The most interesting part of the site is the main Buddhist temple located in the center, surrounded by a small lake. However, overall, the area feels more like a quick stop than a must-see attraction.

Unless you have extra time to spare, this is one you can easily skip. If you're in the area, a short 15‚Äì30 minute visit is more than enough to walk around and take a few pictures.

places.address: 4171, Thailand, Amphoe Ko Samui, Chang Wat Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Coco Tam‚Äôs is a popular open-air beach bar situated on the picturesque Bophut Beach in Koh Samui, Thailand. It offers a relaxed tropical atmosphere with beanbags on the sand, swing seats at the bar, cabanas, and shisha. Visitors can enjoy chilled out tunes and stunning sunset views over the ocean while sipping on refreshing drinks.

sources.snippet: One of Bophut‚Äôs most popular beach bars, Coco Tam‚Äôs offers a fantastic beachfront setting perfect for relaxing after dinner. Famous for its laid-back vibes, fire shows, and beanbag seating right on the sand, Coco Tam‚Äôs is a favorite for those looking to unwind in style. At Coco Tam‚Äôs, guests can sip on cocktails while watching fire dancers perform against the backdrop of the Gulf of Thailand.
sources.shortName: Exploring Bophut‚Äôs Nightlife and Attractions ‚Äì LUXE Samui

sources.snippet: This stylish restaurant in Fisherman‚Äôs Village is spread across two floors, with a wood-fired pizza oven and cocktail bar on the ground and a sleek rooftop terrace above. Tables are overlooking Bohput beach and Koh Phangan. Coco Tam‚Äôs is the perfect excuse to get dressed up for a romantic feast.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Restaurants in Koh Samui

sources.snippet: A beach bar that is on the list of many people visiting Koh Samui, Coco tam‚Äôs is a large two-storey restaurant that opens up to take in the fresh sea breeze.
sources.shortName: The Best Place in Koh Samui For Romantic Dinner

places.name: Coco Tam‚Äôs

reviews.text:
We had an amazing evening at Coco Tam's. Sat on the beach and enjoyed a fantastic pizza each and an excellent fire show.

You do pay Western prices for your pizza and cocktails but given the show and the location, it is worth it. We paid ~‚Ç¨50 for 2 pizzas, 2 cocktails and 2 beers.

Would 100% recommend going to the early fire show as well, we got a table instantly and the sunset was lovely while waiting for the fire show.

Such a nice place!
Sunset was at 18:49, and we arrived at 17:00 to get a spot. At 5 it was still quiet, but by 17:15 the real line had already started ‚Äì so I'd recommend coming at least two hours early!
The staff were friendly and everything was great. The food was decent, nothing more.
Unfortunately it started raining so the fire show was canceled, but the staff were very helpful and kind in assisting us to pack up.

Coco Tam's is a nice place to enjoy a beachside atmosphere and a fire show, but there are some limitations. If you want to have dinner, you can't sit at the beach bar and must be in the restaurant area, which is a bit disappointing if you hoped to dine right on the sand. The pasta dishes are overpriced for the portion size (about 550 baht for seafood pasta) and it's not very filling. The fire show is fun and definitely worth seeing but the service felt just normal, likely because the restaurant was completely full. Overall, it's a decent experience if you come mainly for the fire show, but the food and dining setup could be better.

places.address: 62, Tambon Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Gusto Italiano is a charming restaurant in Bophut, run by a delightful Italian couple. The renovated shophouse offers a romantic dining experience with sea views and beachside seating. The menu features crispy wood-fired pizzas and homemade al dente pasta made with imported ingredients. This restaurant stands out for its mouthwatering pizzas, excellent service, and picturesque sea views. In addition to pizza, the menu includes pastas, risottos, seafood, meat mains, and sides.

sources.snippet: Italian food is well known to be some of the very best in the world, but when it‚Äôs cooked this well and served in a stunning setting like Koh Samui it goes to another level. Gusto Italian in Fisherman‚Äôs Village is a beautiful restaurant that serves up handmade pasta and wood-fired pizza. You can choose to dine directly on the beach or on the romantic terrace overlooking the sea.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Restaurants in Koh Samui

places.name: Gusto Italiano

reviews.text:
A lovely cosy lively little spot overlooking the beach.

Fabulous service we were made to feel right at home.

Great menu and wine list including lots of Italian and French wines.

The food was sensational.

It was busy throughout our dinner which have a great atmosphere.

Right in the heart of fisherman's village, the perfect spot for a late dinner.

A true Italian experience‚Ä¶ with a Thai beachfront view!
Excellent service, attentive and friendly, with rare attention to detail. The food quality is outstanding: the fresh pasta is simply delicious, with authentic flavors that take you straight to Italy‚Ä¶ but even better, as you're dining right by the sea on a beautiful Thai beach! We'll definitely be back to try the pizza as well. Highly recommended!

Authentic Italian by the beach! We had a wonderful meal at Gusto Italiano. We started off with bruschetta and caprese salad. Then for our mains we had the penne arrabbiata and the creamy truffle ravioli. The ravioli was house made and it was a super soft melt in the mouth experience. The wine list was very good too and we enjoyed a selection of reds and whites. We finished off with sambuca shots as a digestivo. Would definitely recommend this restaurant.

places.address: 73/3 Moo 1 Fisherman Village, Bophut, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Salefino Koh Samui is a charming seafood-focused restaurant situated on the outskirts of the island. It offers a stunning view of the sea, making it an ideal escape from crowded diners. The menu showcases Italian and traditional Mediterranean dishes prepared with fresh ingredients from some of Koh Samui's top suppliers. Visitors praise the romantic ambiance, professional service, and phenomenal food, particularly recommending the pasta dishes and octopus. For those seeking a romantic experience, securing a table by the ocean is highly recommended.

sources.snippet: This upscale seafood restaurant serves up delightful Mediterranean dishes, from mussels and prawns to silky Italian pasta and tasty tapas. The romantic setting by the pier means you‚Äôll have views of the fishermen hauling in their catch and the island‚Äôs famous sunset. It‚Äôs rustic chic at its very best, and a little gem of Samui‚Äôs dining scene.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Restaurants in Koh Samui

places.name: Salefino Koh Samui

reviews.text:
We dined here with friends, and the food was so good and delicious that we decided to come back again. The second time, it was just as amazing! ü•Ç It's a charming little restaurant by the sea. I recommend making a reservation before sunset so you can enjoy a breathtaking view of the bay and the sky as it changes colour. üåÖ The food was absolutely delightful and freshly prepared.

The hostess was incredibly kind. ü•∞ I would definitely recommend eating here! üí´

This restaurant is a definite must visit if in Samui. Went with family and loved it.

Gorgeous atmosphere, the restaurant is perfectly decorated to match the beach view whilst you enjoy your meal. Staff are very welcoming and friendly, make you feel at home and well serviced. Italian speaking staff too. Very clean venue.

The food is amazing quality. It is fresh and clean, very flavourful and well-cooked. Our highlights of the night were undoubtedly the Octopus with chickpea sauce, and the Duck ragu pasta.
Also lots of gluten free options (seemingly difficult to find around here). Very authentic food to North Italy.
There was no dish we were disappointed with!

Admittedly the prices were much higher than other restaurants we've been to, however the quality of food and service was certainly better than others.

Restaurant is a little bit hidden on the street which makes location a bit tricky.

Also received delicious complimentary tiramisu for family members birthday!

Overall best restaurant we have visited so far whilst in Thailand/Samui.

Excellent Italian dinner. Started with complimentary cold creamy soup with tomatoes and Bell peppers and bread.

Tuna tartar with fresh japanese tuna. Spaghettone with rock lobster was amazing. The spaghettine was Al dente with great sauce.

Grilled fish was surprisingly fresh, tender and juicy.

Last but not least, the homemade tiramisu made our dinner a perfect ending.

Great service from the crew including a lady from Milan!

Highly recommended!  Make sure you made a reservation but you go.

places.address: ‡∏ï‡πç‡∏≤‡∏ö‡∏• ‡∏ö‡πà‡∏≠‡∏ú‡∏∏‡∏î, Tambon Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Samui Airport is a charming island airport with a tropical ambiance, featuring thatched roofs and open-air design. The airport boasts lush gardens and trees, creating a unique and pleasant setting reminiscent of a resort. Visitors can enjoy browsing through lovely shops offering local treats like Kalamare, while also having access to snacks, soft drinks, coffee, and water provided by Bangkok Airways. The service is commendable, making it feel like more than just an airport.

sources.snippet: Koh Samui is well-connected to major cities of India via flights. Flights land at Samui Airport, a privately-owned international airport which is an attractive destination in itself. Owned and operated by Bangkok Airways, most of the flights from this island are operated by this regional airways.
sources.shortName: Rekindle Romance In Koh Samui, A Place Brimming With Love & Luxury

places.name: Samui Airport

reviews.text:
Koh Samui is a stunning island, and its airport truly feels like a crown jewel ‚Äì one of the most beautiful and comforting airports I've ever visited.

Forget the usual sterile lounges and generic terminals. Here, you're welcomed by open-air parks, breezy canopies instead of enclosed halls, and charming market-style shops in place of sprawling duty-free zones.

The moment you land, you're greeted with lush greenery, Thai-style huts, and even a large Buddha statue next to the runway - a serene, almost cinematic welcome. The airport staff is incredibly warm and helpful, adding to the whole laid-back, island vibe (then again, almost everyone in Thailand is wonderfully kind!).

This isn't just an airport; it's a destination in itself. You'll find bean bags, hammocks, lounge chairs, and the occasional shaded bench - creating a peaceful blend of comfort and nature. It's the kind of place where you wouldn't mind a delayed flight.

‚ôø Wheelchair Accessibility: The entire airport is on one level and fully wheelchair accessible. Whether you're arriving or departing, navigation is smooth and hassle-free.

Even if you're not flying, this is a space where you can park your car, sip fresh coconut water, and watch flights take off against a backdrop of palm trees. It's surreal, calming, and refreshingly un-airport-like.

A perfect airport for a perfect island. Almost everything is outside and there are plenty of places to just sit and chill here. It's very small so you do not need 2 hours here - 1 hour is more than enough to get in, get situated and be able to grab a quick bite before boarding.

I mean for an island airport it's pretty decent and fluid. A little delay here and there but nothing bad. was surprised by the easy flow of arriving and departing. The court yard areas outside and hang out areas are so cool for an airport.
Really island life !

enough cool places and snacks and coffee shops to hold you over until your flight. Also all domestic so you do not have to be as worried about the pressure of arriving insanely early. an hour is more than enough.

places.address: 99, Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: The Club by Zazen is a charming restaurant located on Bophut Beach, offering stunning sea views and the option of dining outdoors. The interior is styled with a Mediterranean touch, providing a romantic atmosphere for couples. The menu features a diverse selection of European and Thai dishes, ensuring there's something for everyone to enjoy. Guests have praised the attentive staff and exceptional service, making it an ideal spot for special occasions like birthdays.

sources.snippet: Part of Zazen Boutique Resort and Spa, it‚Äôs highly praised for both its romantic atmosphere and delicious cuisine. You can enjoy exquisite Thai specialities and French-influenced delicacies, along with an impressive wine list. Zazen is one of the favourite restaurants for couples who want to experience an exclusive dining experience in Koh Samui.
sources.shortName: The Best Place in Koh Samui For Romantic Dinner

places.name: The Club by Zazen

reviews.text: I came to this restaurant with my girlfriend from Chaweng and it was absolutely worth it. The food is amazing, served beautifully and in style. The service was provided by Art, who provided a top experience. I was caughing due to my cold during eating and he instantly served me with a cup of hot water with lemon. Absolutely recommended !

I really like the setting and ambience of The Club by Zazen restaurant.  Great sea view and vibe next to the swimming pool.  Excellent decor.  Very stylish.

The food we had was also excellent, as was the service.

I highly recommend this restaurant.

üå¥‚ú® Beautiful Balinese-Style Restaurant with Great Service!

The staff here are incredibly friendly and attentive - we felt very welcomed from the moment we arrived. Their service was excellent, and they really made our experience special.

The atmosphere is stunning, with a tropical Balinese vibe and a romantic view overlooking the sea. It's the perfect spot for a relaxing lunch or a romantic dinner date üíï.

üìå Tip: If you plan to visit around noon, be prepared - it can get quite hot, especially in the outdoor seating area. Some days are breezy and comfortable, but on sunny days, the heat might be intense. Visiting in the late afternoon or early evening might be a better option for a more pleasant experience.

Overall, it's definitely worth a visit. The views, ambiance, and warm service make it a memorable dining experience üå∫.

places.address: 177, Beach, Bo Put, Amphoe Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Perched atop the cliffs of Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, Paper Moon Restaurant offers an elegant dining experience with three distinct areas to choose from. The menu features a wide selection of Thai and Western dishes, catering to various preferences. With breathtaking views of the Andaman Sea, it's an ideal spot for a romantic dinner in Koh Samui. Guests have praised the delicious food at reasonable prices and highlighted the generous portion sizes.

sources.snippet: Moon is a clifftop restaurant at Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, on the eastern end of Lamai Beach. This elegant venue has 3 distinctive areas: an air-conditioned dining room, an expansive rooftop lounge/bar, and a large outdoor wooden terrace on huge granite boulders.The extensive menu at Moon will please those who enjoy Thai and western dishes. With views of the Andaman Sea, the restaurant‚Äôs settings and atmosphere are great for a romantic dinner in Koh Samui.
sources.shortName: The Best Place in Koh Samui For Romantic Dinner

places.name: Paper Moon Restaurant

reviews.text: Amazing place with an authentic Thai and European dishes that taste delicious ! Fair price, big portion. 100% recommend !

So by my experience, because the chefs are thai, thai dishes are amazing and very good price, but the european dishes are not their strong side. Looks like family business and they are all super kind and sweet.
Great family run restaurant.  Authentic Thai cuisine.  Food is very very nice and great value for money.   Highly recommend A+++

places.address: 101, 4, Tambon Maret, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84310, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Fisherman's Village Night Market is a vibrant hub of culinary delights and local culture, perfect for those looking to indulge in an authentic experience. As the sun sets, the market comes alive with stalls offering a variety of delicious street food that showcases the region's flavors. From fresh seafood to tantalizing desserts, there's something for every palate. The lively atmosphere is enhanced by local artisans showcasing their crafts, making it not just a place to eat but also to shop and soak in the unique ambiance.

sources.snippet: Quaint Fisherman‚Äôs Village along Bophut Beach is a must-see on Koh Samui, even if it is a bit touristy. As well as rustic wooden buildings housing everything from boutique shops to cool beach bars, it comes alive every Friday evening with a bustling night market. It‚Äôs brimming with brilliant street food stalls where you can sample everything from crispy insects on skewers to hot roti ‚Äì Indian style pancakes slathered in condensed milk, sliced banana and chocolate sauce.
sources.shortName: The Best Restaurants in Koh Samui

sources.snippet: Fisherman‚Äôs Village in Koh Samui is a beautiful and vibrant walking street of hipster cafes, buzzing beach clubs, boutique shops and some great restaurants serving delicious Thai and global cuisines. The area also sees fun street performances like Muay Thai demos, beatboxing, and traditional Thai dances that add to the charm of the place. Located on the Northern Coast, it is just a short 30-minutes drive away from Chaweng.
sources.shortName: Rekindle Romance In Koh Samui, A Place Brimming With Love & Luxury

sources.snippet: The local community is very proud of their village and a conscious effort on their part has been to keep the area becoming a second Chaweng, the peace and tranquility found here is a complete contrast to the faster paced Chaweng, which is only 15 minutes away or so. The market here is definitely more geared for a romantic stay or for families and young children.
sources.shortName: Bophut Beach - The Beaches of Koh Samui

sources.snippet: Every Friday night, roads are closed to make way for locals and tourists alike to roam the Fisherman‚Äôs Village Night Market. It is an opportunity to explore rustic shopping stalls selling goods of every kind ‚Äì souvenirs, Thai handicrafts, clothes, bags, shoes, street food ‚Äì you name it, this maze of shopping stalls has them all.
sources.shortName: Guide to Fisherman's Village in Koh Samui

places.name: Fisherman's Village Night Market

reviews.text:
So this is the place you would want to be most of the nights you spend in Koh Samui.
The restaurant and bars are a bit expensive side but then you walk through the walking street and man, this just LIT up. Very nice place with lods of open are to enjoy your cocktails and fresh food from the open market there also enjoy live performance.
I used to be there most of the nights, the walking street opens for only few days a week, not every day.
There is a huge open parking by Holiday inn.
Beautiful happening place with not matched anywhere kinda vibe.

We visited the Fisherman's Village Night Market during our stay in Samui, and overall, it was a really enjoyable experience, especially for an evening walk with the kids.

The atmosphere was lively and pleasant, with good music playing in the background and a fun, relaxed vibe throughout the market.
We loved walking around, seeing all the different stalls, and taking in the sights, smells, and sounds.
The food stalls smelled amazing, and there were lots of tempting options, but we didn't end up trying any food this time.

While the experience itself was great, we did notice that some of the prices were quite high, especially compared to other local markets.
In fact, we later found out that many of the same items (like beach toys and accessories) were being sold for lower prices on the nearby streets, just outside the main market area.
So if you're planning to buy those things, it might be worth walking a little bit outside the main market first to compare prices.

Still, it's definitely worth visiting for the nice vibe, music, and family-friendly atmosphere.
Just be aware of the pricing if you're planning to shop!

Great place and awesome vibes, suits for families and for everyone basically.
Love shows are really nice, food is tasty and you can just take what you want and sit at one of the bar's tables

places.address: H25J+9HJ, Tambon Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Bo Phut Beach, located in the north of Koh Samui, is a modest yet charming destination that offers a mix of natural beauty and cultural experiences. The beach is divided into two sections: Bophut Beach itself and the renowned Fisherman's Village. This village is known for its well-preserved elegance, with wooden Chinese shop-houses blending seamlessly with modern buildings to create a Mediterranean atmosphere. It was once the main French outpost on the island.

sources.snippet: Some of the other beach destinations in Koh Samui include Ao Phang Ka, a quiet beach on the southwest corner of the island; Hat Bo Phut, a coarse and shelly space that inclines steeply into the cloudy water; or even Hat Ban Hua Thanon, a beach that offers an insight into the Thai fishing community.
sources.shortName: Rekindle Romance In Koh Samui, A Place Brimming With Love & Luxury

sources.snippet: Bophut Beach is part of Bophut village which location is situated in the middle of the beach. This beautiful long golden sandy beach is kissed by gentle ripples from the warm waters of the Gulf of Thailand. And the beach spreads a few kilometers from Maenam Beach to Big Buddha Beach.
sources.shortName: Bophut Beach - The Beaches of Koh Samui
Guide to Fisherman's Village in Koh Samui

places.name: Bo Phut Beach

reviews.text: Very pleasant hotel. Nice beach access and rooms. The staff was helpful and very nice. Some of them even remember our names! The breakfast was excellent and they offer lots of choice. And the hotel has lots of activities planned weekly.  The management staff actually walk around and speak with the guest. Which is a very old-school, but very nice touch! Would definitely recommend this hotel.

Hidden Gem in Ko Samui ‚Äì Fisherman's Village at Bo Phut Beach üåûüåä

Stumbled upon this charming¬†Fisherman's Village¬†during our Ko Samui adventure-and it turned out to be one of the highlights of our trip! Nestled along the picturesque¬†Bo Phut Beach, this spot perfectly blends laid-back beach vibes with vibrant island culture.

By day, it's a sun-drenched haven ‚òÄÔ∏è-great for strolling, beachside lounging, and popping into cozy caf√©s. But as the sun sets, the whole village transforms üåÖ‚ú®. The streets come alive with lights, music, and a buzzing energy that's both relaxing and exciting.

You'll find everything here:
üé®¬†Talented local artists¬†showcasing unique pieces
üíà¬†Trendy barbershops¬†with serious style
üíÖ¬†Chic nail parlors¬†for that perfect vacation manicure
üíÜ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è¬†Massage shops¬†offering pure bliss with an ocean breeze

And don't even get me started on the food-incredible beachside restaurants¬†serving up fresh seafood, Thai favorites, and global flavors in a cozy, candle-lit setting.

Whether you're looking to unwind or explore,¬†Fisherman's Village¬†is a must-visit slice of Ko Samui paradise.

Very coarse sand and unclear water, however, close access to food markets and fisherman's village which come alive at night. Some restaurants have beach access and it's nice to sit and listen to the waves. Great fires shows.

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the tree canopies, Tree Tops Signature Dining offers a romantic and exclusive dining experience with only eight tables located in stunning treehouses. This fine dining spot at Anantara Lawana Koh Samui is perfect for special occasions and requires advanced reservations. The menu features seafood and red meat dishes such as Rougie Foie Gras and Scallop, Mediterranean Lamb, and Snow Fish.

sources.snippet: One of the best places to eat in Koh Samui (especially if you‚Äôre all about aesthetics), Tree Tops Sky Dining will blow your mind with its lush location and exquisite menu. Nestled in the jungle near Chaweng Bay and part of the Anantara Lawana hotel, visitors get to dine on gourmet fusion grub in their own private pagodas suspended on stilts. Word of warning: Tree Top‚Äôs outlook makes it one of the most romantic spots on the island, so expect to see plenty of loved-up couples.
sources.shortName: The Best Restaurants in Koh Samui

sources.snippet: Tree Tops Sky Dining & Bar is one of the best-loved romantic restaurants in Koh Samui. Located at the luxurious Anantara resort, the restaurant offers lush tropical views reaching all the way to the ocean. The menu includes international a la carte options and curated degustation options complemented by an extensive wine list.
sources.shortName: Most Romantic Dining Experiences in Koh Samui

sources.snippet: The beauty of this restaurant is that it is super exclusive, with just eight private Salas in the place. The restaurant is among the canopy of 120-year-old trees with leafy views. The food is also every bit as good as the setting.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Restaurants in Koh Samui

places.name: Tree Tops Signature Dining

reviews.text: Fine dining at its best. We dined here as we were staying at anantara lawana and the dinner at the tree top restaurant. The overall  Ambience and expensive was perfect and views were amazing. All courses were presented beautifully and the vegetarian and non vegetarian menu items were super delicious. Our server took care of us throughout and this was one of my top meals. Featured in white lotus as well, a must try while you are in Koh Samui.

Had a great final meal in Thailand here. The service from Benz was excellent, and all of the staff were friendly and helpful. The food came out quickly and the quality was excellent. I'd recommend booking early as I booked the day before and had to do the 9pm sitting which ended quite late for me, meaning I didn't get the nice view.

We had a wonderful anniversary dinner here. Our server Art and all the staff were very professional and we felt warmly welcomed. The place is stunning and I would advice to have to seat at 6pm so that you can enjoy the sea and garden view by daylight and the nice atmosphere of darkness and cozy lights in the evening. Also be there a bit earlier to enjoy a nice drink at the bar before dinner.
Our table had been decorated cozy and personally. The food itself was lovely and a very special choice of earth and sea delicacies. 100/100 points!
If there is any negative point, please be aware that prices do not include 7% vat and 10% service fee, which wasn't mentioned when booking and even making the deposit on the website to guarantee the booking. It didn‚Äòt really affect our beautiful experience, but it would be good to clearly know in advance. Still worth of 5 stars for us!

places.address: 92, 1, Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Dr Frogs Bar & Grill is a stunning hilltop venue located between Chaweng and Lamai, offering breathtaking views of the coastline, especially at sunset. The elegant decor creates an inviting atmosphere to enjoy a wide variety of pizzas, from traditional tomato and cheese to unique options like truffle oil and lobster variations. One standout option is the Capriccioso pizza, featuring ham, mushroom, olives, salami, mozzarella cheese, and their signature sauce.

sources.snippet: Frogs (as it is known locally) has amazing cuisine and is the perfect setting to enjoy a wonderful meal while taking the scenery in. You‚Äôll find it on the coastal road between Chaweng and Lamai, offering breathtaking sea views and delicious dishes. The atmosphere is charming, with attentive staff, gentle music and a gourmet menu of food and wine from around the world.
sources.shortName: The 7 Most Romantic Restaurants in Koh Samui

places.name: Dr Frogs Bar & Grill

reviews.text: What a wonderful experience! Our beautiful night included gorgeous Samui lights and water views, impeccable service, a well appointed restaurant interior, delicious high quality foods, and a gorgeous and flavorful Pavlova. We had the tuna tacos and the lamb shank. They were both well plated and absolutely delicious. The lamb shank was literally the best lamb shank I've ever had in my life...and I've had quite a few. The restaurant is moderately priced. Definitely not one of the cheapest on the island, but also not among the most expensive. For us we were thrilled with our experience and it was well worth every baht! We will definitely return next time we are back on the island.

Delicious food, amazing staff and stunning views! We had starters and mains and because it was so good, we decided to have a dessert. We had pavlova and it was a show stopper! If you're in Koh Samui - it's a must

Great food in a traditional English-style restaurant/pub with one of the most beautiful views on Samui. We love the Sunday roast here - feels like a little piece of 'home'. Great for the whole family! (Slightly on the pricey side)

places.address: Chaweng Noi, 103 B, Moo Bophut 3, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: InFusion Cooking Classes in North Samui is a great option for villa vacationers looking to explore Thai cooking. The classes cater to all ages and include a tour of the on-site organic garden or local markets, as well as walking food tours. Participants can choose their dishes and enjoy a personalized experience with the option of a guided local market visit. The classes provide valuable insights into Thai fruits, vegetables, and herbs while offering useful cooking tips.

sources.snippet: You can check with your hotel for booking one or pick any of the other classes available in the island. They let you pick your ingredients from the local market and prepare the dishes step by step.
sources.shortName: Koh Samui - A complete guide to the romantic tropical paradise

places.name: InFusion Cooking Classes

reviews.text: Incredible experience - I have always dreamed of doing a Thai cooking class and this exceeded my expectations, if you are on Samui you MUST spend an evening here. We were picked up from our hotel, brought to the market for a Rich cultural experience then back to the kitchen with unbelievable views. Made our own curry paste from scratch, and they had so many dishes to choose from. 11/10! Will be back!

Excellent cooking class with the most lovely team! Starting with a trip to the market to get your ingredients followed by step by step preparation for 4 dishes. You will not go hungry! And with a stunning view to enjoy your food in front of. Would highly recommend for anyone who wants an authentic experience.

An amazing experience from start to finish! Pick is absolutely lovely and explains every step of the recipe so clearly, making the whole class easy and enjoyable. The views from the terrace are absolutely stunning, like cooking in paradise. We truly loved the entire experience, and the food was absolutely delicious. Highly recommended, 100%!

places.address: 81, 1 Ocean Villa, Bo Put, Amphoe Ko Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

sources.snippet: The View Restaurant is part of Melati Beach Resort & Spa, located on Thongson Bay in the northern area of Koh Samui. It‚Äôs a great place to dine with fantastic views, gentle sea breeze, and romantic d√©cor. Koh Phangan, lying around 12 km off Samui‚Äôs coast, is visible from this beachfront restaurant.
sources.shortName: The Best Place in Koh Samui For Romantic Dinner

places.name: Peak Eye View Restaurant

reviews.text: We walked up from the secret garden. It was blazing hot but we had the restaurant all to ourselves. The mango and pineapple smoothies were the best on the island, as well as the fried rice. Service and atmosphere and view were excellent.

The worst restaurant I had in Thailand ! I don't understand why there are so many good reviews‚Ä¶ The only good point is the view is ok but not extraordinary either‚Ä¶ The building is such a horrible place, it's like we eat in a construction‚Ä¶ the tables and the chairs are juste so old and without any decoration. The worst is the food! For this place, one Pad Thai cost 180! One coke cost 60! And the rice for 30 and it's cold! The food added a lot of salt and sauce and the portion is so so small! I think it's from the refrigerator some days ago cause there were nobody in the restaurant ! There are no other choice nearby otherwise I will never come in !
What a great quiet spot. Amazing after visiting the Tarnim Magic Garden! Nice owner, great view and nice food.

places.address: Na Mueang, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84140, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in a cozy spot in Maenam, The Boudoir is an award-winning French restaurant that exudes rustic-bohemian opulence with its fusion of French and Middle-Eastern decor. The ambiance is enhanced by red silk accents, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. Guests can indulge in delectable Provencal French cuisine featuring classic dishes such as escargots, foie gras, and Cognac.

sources.snippet: No one does romance quite like the French and The Boudoir is hands down the best French restaurant in Koh Samui. The small family-owned venue is located in Maenam and serves divine French flavours in an opulent setting inspired by the Arabian Nights. The Boudoir has very limited seating and finding the place might take some effort ‚Äì but this only adds to the venues cult status.
sources.shortName: Most Romantic Dining Experiences in Koh Samui

places.name: The Boudoir

reviews.text: Some of the best food we've had on our travels! The duck breast, the steak and the chicken were superb, and the presentation was lovely! You feel like you are having dinner in someone's garden, but with welcoming atmosphere and tranquility. Don't be discouraged if you can't find it at first as it's really hidden away from the main road. Have a taxi take you there!

Exceptional experience to recommend to anyone who loves French cuisine. The setting is subdued and intimate, ideal for spending a successful time with the people you love. The menu is varied, with very fresh products and mainly French-inspired dishes. I was spoiled by a multi-lane menu, statistically multiplying the risk of missteps, but nothing came of it. I would rate the dining experience as perfect, as was the service by the way, and I will definitely be returning there on my next visit to koh samui. I highly recommend it !

I went down three times to try to eat at Boudoir during its ‚Äúopening hours‚Äù as it was next to our villa.

Two out of three it was entirely closed the last time it was ‚Äúopen‚Äù but with none of the tables set up (chairs stacked on tables ) and no food being prepared at 8:15pm, we were told they were fully booked!

I don't know what the situation is I guess they only open if they have large group bookings as they weren't getting enough customers to open like a normal restaurant.

Either way don't waste your time / taxi in coming here unless you are positive they will accommodate (and even then be wary the other people who arrived when we did said they booked months ago and they told
Them the same as us).

places.address: ‡∏ï‡∏≥‡∏ö‡∏• ‡πÅ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ô‡πâ‡∏≥, Tambon Mae Nam, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Chaweng Beach is a vibrant and expansive stretch of sand that captures the essence of Koh Samui's lively atmosphere. This popular destination attracts visitors from around the world, offering an array of nearby resorts, restaurants, and shopping options. With its bustling nightlife and a market that spans three kilometers, Chaweng Beach is perfect for those looking to indulge in retail therapy or savor delicious local cuisine. Whether you're on the hunt for trendy swimwear or unique souvenirs, you'll find it all here.

sources.snippet: Anavana Beach Resort offers a tropical boutique retreat along southern Chaweng Beach on Koh Samui. Overlooking the Gulf of Siam, it boasts an outdoor pool and Thai-style cottages with free Wi-Fi. Set within landscaped gardens, cottages at Anavana Beach Resort feature private terraces and stylish open-air bathrooms.
sources.shortName: My 20 most Romantic Getaway Hotels in Ko Samui

sources.snippet: Begin a sun-soaked day at Chaweng, the largest and most popular beach in Koh Samui. Fringed by rocky promontories and an offshore reef, this picturesque five-kilometre stretch is a must-visit. The powdery-white sands here come coupled with two small islands nearby and another beautiful bay.
sources.shortName: Rekindle Romance In Koh Samui, A Place Brimming With Love & Luxury

places.name: Chaweng Beach

reviews.text: Lovely beach, sometimes busy but never overly packed. Nice scenery and restaurants dotted along the beach

Large beach of several kilometers where it is good to walk. The color of the water changes according to the weather. Beware the sea is sometimes very rough with a lot of waves.
Lots of massage tent all along and many bars and restaurants to enjoy the view.

We weren't sure whether to bother with this beach initially, a slight concern that it might be crazy busy and full of rubbish etc‚Ä¶ however I'm glad we did because it's one of the most beautiful beaches on Samui.

Sand colour on any beach can appear to change from white to yellow depending on the sun/conditions, but the few days we spent here it was white sand and calm blue waters.

Theres loads to do with bars, restaurants and sunbeds to rent. Plus jet skis etc for those that are interested. It wasn't too busy in June and there was no hassle from beach sellers. The planes coming in and out of Samui Airport made for an interesting back drop too.

places.generalDescription: Nestled on the beachfront, Baitong Restaurant offers stunning ocean views and a relaxed atmosphere. It is popular among families and large groups, but also provides an intimate Candlelight Dinner experience for couples, featuring romantic coastal setups with heart-shaped lanterns and a five-course meal paired with sparkling wine. The menu boasts a variety of Thai and international dishes, including a Monday night Thai buffet. Whether it's breakfast, lunch, dinner or late-night dining, this restaurant caters to all needs.

sources.shortName: The Best Place in Koh Samui For Romantic Dinner

places.name: Baitong Restaurant

reviews.text: Cozy and welcoming restaurant right on the first line near the sea. The atmosphere is enhanced by nice music and friendly staff. It's a little bit pricey, but the experience and location make it worth it!

I enjoyed some delicious banana fritters and a fresh coconut while soaking in the beautiful beach and ocean view! The staff are incredibly helpful and friendly. The whole place has a really lovely atmosphere and is very relaxing. Stunning fresh flowers on every table and it was very cute watching staff engage with the kids.

A beautiful restaurant located directly at the beach. The view and the atmosphere is amazing. The strawberry ice tea tasted fresh and delicious. The spring rolls were a little bit  overcooked but with the sauce still great and the pad thai was decent. The creme br√ªl√©e was amazing. The price was fair, but on the more expensive side of restaurants in the area.

places.address: 201 ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏π‡πà‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 2 ‡∏ñ‡∏ô‡∏ô ‡πÄ‡∏â‡∏ß‡∏á, Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

sources.snippet: A huge 12 meter high golden Buddha statue sitting on an elevated platform and rimmed by the sea ‚Äì  this is a must see in Samui. The place has a very unique and calming vibe. And the view of the ocean from the mesa is breathtaking.
sources.shortName: Koh Samui - A complete guide to the romantic tropical paradise

places.name: Phra Sangkachai Wat Plai Laem

reviews.text: Put this on your Koh Samui to-do list! The temples are all near each other making it a great spot to spend a few hours exploring the grounds and marvelling at these impressive statues and temples. You will have to take your shoes off at some of the statues but this is well sign-posted to avoid confusion.
There is a nice little collection of attractions built onto platforms within the lake, this is one of the three.

Phra Sangkachai at Wat Plai Laem ‚Äì A Must-Visit Gem in Ko Samui üõïüå¥

Just a quick 10-minute drive from Ko Samui Airport, Wat Plai Laem is home to the serene and smiling figure of Phra Sangkachai, a beloved monk known for his wisdom and contentment. This temple is more than just a spiritual retreat-it's an experience that blends culture, beauty, and fun for the whole family.

Open daily to both tourists and locals, the temple welcomes visitors to explore its peaceful grounds, admire the stunning architecture, and make offerings for good fortune. üì∏ Don't forget your camera-the vibrant colors and intricate details make it a photographer's paradise.

Got little ones in tow? Keep them entertained with fish feeding at the temple pond-always a hit! While the kids enjoy this calming activity, adults can take in the rich cultural atmosphere, offer prayers, or simply soak in the tranquil surroundings.

Whether you're seeking a spiritual moment, a splash of local culture, or just a peaceful stop on your island adventure, Phra Sangkachai at Wat Plai Laem is a must-see spot on Ko Samui. üõ∂‚≠êÔ∏è

places.address: H3C9+J2H, Bo Put, Ko Samui District, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Vana Spa, located in a beautiful and serene setting with lush greenery and stunning landscaping, offers a variety of massages, treatments, and Signature Rituals for couples. The spa provides a relaxing experience from the moment you arrive, with friendly staff who welcome you with a refreshing Thai drink and take the time to understand your preferences and medical history. Guests have praised the skilled therapists at Vana Spa for their knowledge and passion for their work, providing excellent treatments that leave visitors feeling extremely relaxed.

sources.snippet: Vana Spa offers several Signature Rituals that you can experience together as a couple as well as all kinds of massages and treatments. Pretty good and romantic way to spend several hours, don't you think?. The spa itself is located in a beautiful spot, with lush greenery and gorgeous landscaping.
sources.shortName: 5 Romantic Things To Do in Koh Samui

places.name: Vana Spa

reviews.text:
Vana Spa is another one of my favorite spas. The atmosphere here is like walking in a garden on heaven, shady, peaceful and quiet. There is a unique Thai identity that is like no other. Everything blends together perfectly. All the staffs are very welcoming and provide excellent service. I would like to thank Mai
my masseuse, and Khun Kiki,
the Sp manager, for taking good care of the spa and the team, making my treatment today is perfect.

We are enjoying the vana spa for a few years now and it is such an excellent experience every single time! Tu and Mai are wonderful massage therapists they work with knowledge and passion for their job! We are looking forward to come again in a few weeks!!

Vana Belle Spa located at the Vana Belle Luxury Resort in Koh Samui is an excellent spot for your next treatment. It is a beautiful and peaceful spot where employees are extremely friendly and capable. My masseuse was Apple üçè and she is really great at what she does. I felt extremely relaxed after her treatments. They welcome you with a refreshing Thai drink, ask about your preferences and medical history. After the intake you are brought to a massage room where you can refresh and change. Upon the completion you receive a complimentary drink. It was a fantastic experience! üôèüèºüôèüèºüôèüèº

places.address: 9, Noi, 99 Chaweng Beach Rd, Tambon Bo Put, Koh Samui, Surat Thani 84320, Thailand
